title: Windows Server Hybrid Administrator
subtitle: Hybrid Cloud Infrastructure Management
description: Master hybrid Windows Server environments with Azure integration
overview: This comprehensive 3-day course covers hybrid Windows Server administration, including Azure Arc integration, hybrid identity solutions, storage management, and modern infrastructure operations. Learn to design and manage hybrid environments that seamlessly integrate on-premises and cloud resources.

personalStory.story: Managing Azure at enterprise scale requires more than just technical knowledge—it requires battle-tested strategies. I've managed Azure environments for organizations with thousands of users, and I've learned what works and what doesn't. In this training, I share the real-world administrative patterns that have saved countless hours and prevented critical issues.
